views.markdown:
- add compatibility for iOS 11 - fix crashing/freezing on search
- no more 'App May Slow Down Your iPhone' Warning
- fix for crash/respring in iOS 9.2-9.3.3 - partial fix for iOS 8 (can now search app bundle contents) fixed problem with popup not closing in iOS 7

Optimized for iOS 7 - fix problem where Cydia would open after completed search
- fix iPad icon
- added reference to VideoExplorer app
- fix problem with action menu buttons not being touchable in last update
- fix minor file search/view problem
Features from AudioExplorer+:
- Badges on Queue Tab bar indicating the number of items in the queue
- Tab bar icons now also in retina resolution
Updated texts with information about AudioExplorer+

- minor fix for iPhone 5 (startup image and app layout) and iPad (startup image)

- Quick update for iOS 6 (fix for About tab).

- added the ability to add multiple audio file to queue at once
- fixes for iOS 4
- id3 tag titles show up in audio lists, if available
- adds a queue (will be used in the paid version for adding audio files to ringtones/iPod library. In the free version it can be used as a kind of favorites list.)
Note: This version updates the cache file structure, so a rescan of the audio files is necessary.
This version should finally fix crashes on start-up from the last few versions.
Also added ability to delete a listing from the app list. Search process has been optimized - fix for iOS 5.1.1
- fix for crashes on other systems

- optimized search speed to avoid iOS forcing crashes on some devices
- added a built-in file browser that filters out non-audio files and empty folders (with a lookahead of one level), to help find audio files not stored in apps

- better app icon support (using the AppList library)
- no longer need to refresh after updating App Store apps
- improved audio file info storage (switch from plists to Core Data)
- bug fixes in audio file search
- layout/text and icon/launch image changes
- new menu structure
- bug fix in audio file search
- bug fix in sorting
- layout/text changes
